text: "Heartbreak Station" is a song by glam metal band Cinderella from their 1990 album of the same name. As a single, it peaked at #44 on the Hot 100. ==External links== * Category:1990 songs Category:1991 singles Category:Cinderella (band) songs Category:Mercury Records singles Category:Songs written by Tom Keifer
title: Heartbreak Station (song)
